input.sentences: the university was proud to graduate the largest class they ever had .
the students were ready to transition into the real world .
professors spoke very kindly of their former students .
some of the faculty almost fell asleep while on stage .
pictures were being taken everywhere and everyone had a great time .
output.sentences: The university graduates were very proud and one of the largest groups
The world saw them transition from normal people to students
The students spoke kindly of all their professors
On the stage, heads fell as the students thanks the faculty
They spent so much time together and made sure to take pictures after the graduation
